A '''mundane potion''' is a potion that provides no effects. {{IN|bedrock}}, it can be used to brew [[potions of Weakness]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Redstone Dust; Breeze Rod; Stone; Slime Block; Cobweb; Magma Cream; Rabbit's Foot; Sugar; Glistering Melon Slice; Spider Eye; Ghast Tear; Blaze Powder
|base = Water Bottle
|Mundane Potion
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Gunpowder
|base = Mundane Potion
|Mundane Splash Potion
|name = Mundane Splash Potion
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Mundane Splash Potion
|Mundane Lingering Potion
|name = Mundane Lingering Potion
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Mundane Splash Potion'''
|foot=1
}}

== Usage ==
===Base potion===
{{IN|bedrock}}:

Only usable as an alternative base for potion of Weakness.
Long mundane potions cannot be obtained in Survival mode. It can only be brewed into an extended potion of Weakness.

{{Brewing
|head = 1
|base = Mundane Potion
|Fermented Spider Eye
|Potion of Weakness
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|base = Long Mundane Potion
|Fermented Spider Eye
|Potion of Weakness Extended
|name = Potion of Weakness Extended
|showvariants=1
|foot=1
}}

=== Lingering potion ===
{{IN|bedrock}}, a lingering mundane potion acts similar to the [[lingering water bottle]], being able to extinguish burning entities and damage [[endermen]], [[blaze]]s, and [[snow golem]]s, but without the ability to put out fires.
